name: Chao Illust Club
storyline:
Let's aim to become illustration masters with Sarah & Momo, the original characters of the illustration club!

Learn how to draw illustrations well with lessons using videos and diagrams!

In addition to drawing illustrations of exchanged friends, you can also communicate and relay illustrations! You can
easily save the drawn illustrations to the SD card and show them freely!
summary: Learn how to draw illustrations well with lessons using videos and diagrams!
